summary: This document is an email from an FBI agent forwarding two communications from individuals who may have information about Jeffrey Epstein. It includes a voicemail attachment and a referral from an attorney named Blair Fellows regarding a client with information.

persons.name: Blair Fellows
persons.context: An attorney who contacted the FBI agent, stating she has a client with information about Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The individual about whom potential information is being offered by the attorney's client.

connections.description: Blair Fellows is an attorney who claims to have a client with information about Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Attorney contact regarding Epstein information
events.description: Attorney Blair Fellows contacted an FBI agent, stating she has a client with information about Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Voicemail received with potential tip
events.description: An FBI agent received a voicemail from an individual potentially offering information about Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: On October 10, 2019, an FBI agent received communications from individuals potentially offering information about Jeffrey Epstein.
Attorney Blair Fellows contacted the FBI, stating she has a client with information about Epstein.
A voicemail attachment was included with the email, suggesting another potential source of information.
The FBI agent was forwarding these tips as part of standard procedure for receiving information about the case.
